questions.text: what does Grant do during the Penn Relays?

questions.answer: A trust fund worth one million dollars and a lifetime sponsorship deal from Babblemoney Sneaker Company

questions.text: what does the Greek word "Skepsis" mean?

questions.answer: We got tired of pooping in the woods

questions.answer: They subscribe to the youtube channel

questions.answer: Everyone do your best! Everyone do your best!

questions.text: what do Grant and Jay do when they approach the finish line of the final in the Million Dollar Race?
questions.answer: Sit down, back to back, and link arms
